sentences.en: She seems very grounded and down-to-earth.
sentences.cn: 她看上去非常现实，注重实际。

sentences.en: The book is a friendly, down-to-earth introduction to physics.
sentences.cn: 这是一本简明、实用的物理学入门书。

sentences.en: Gloria is probably the most down-to-earth person I've ever met.
sentences.cn: 格洛丽亚可能是我见过的最脚踏实地的人。
